name: Jobsworth
description:
The Brief

Working as a part of a team, deliver a high-quality game project.

Game Description

Jobsworth is a third-person physics-driven puzzler and plate-spinner where the player has to complete various tasks to keep the pub running smoothly and customers happy — or not. Taking inspiration from an adventure puzzle solver, Human Fall Flat, our main focus was to develop a game that follows the same funny physics-driven aspect but put it into an environment where the player has the freedom to manage a pub the way they want to.

Controls: PC | PS4 | Xbox

Movement              - WASD | Left Analogue stick
Rotate player        - QE         | Right Analogue stick
Jump                          - Space   | X                                            | A
Left Hand Grab    - LMB     | L2                                          | LT
Right Hand Grab - RMB    | R2                                         | RT
Pause                         - Esc/P   | Options                             | Menu

(When Object Grabbed)
Lift/Lower Object -              | Right Analogue stick up/down
Rotate Object         -              | Right Analogue stick up/down

Guide To Downloading:

Extract the zip file and select the "Jobsworth" file and play.
